name: United Bank Shares, Inc.
description: United Bank Shares, Inc. is a financial services company that operates through its subsidiary, United Bank. Founded in 1839, the company is headquartered in Charleston, West Virginia, and has grown to become one of the largest financial institutions in the region. United Bank offers a comprehensive range of banking and financial services, including personal and business banking, mortgage lending, wealth management, and investment services. The company prides itself on its strong community ties and commitment to customer service, providing tailored financial solutions to individuals, families, and businesses. With a network of branches across West Virginia, Virginia, Maryland, and Washington D.C., United Bank is dedicated to supporting the economic growth of the communities it serves. The company has a focus on digital banking innovations, allowing customers to manage their finances conveniently through online and mobile banking platforms. United Bank is also committed to corporate social responsibility, engaging in numerous charitable initiatives and community development projects to enhance the quality of life in its service areas.

seo.meta_title: United Bank Shares, Inc. | Comprehensive Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore United Bank Shares, Inc., a leading financial services provider offering personal and business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions.

faq.question: What services does United Bank offer?
faq.answer: United Bank offers personal and business banking services, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of United Bank Shares, Inc.?
faq.answer: Richard M. Adams is the CEO of United Bank Shares, Inc.

faq.question: Where is United Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: United Bank is headquartered in Charleston, West Virginia, USA.
